title: What's the point of ARAM if it's going to be ignored
body:
A lot of players play it and the game is in such a bad state, I prefer ARAM over Ranked - a gamemode which I'm dominating currently. Yet, ARAM has the worst "randomness" to it. 

Constant marksmen teams and toxic poke compositions against all melees. 
ARAM only accounts.

Why don't we fix ARAM? We can easily address a majority of these issues with minor fixes.

- Make the entire champion pool available instead of the player's own pool of owned champions
 - Helps new players possibly try out champions they haven't played before
 - Stops ARAM only accounts from dominating
- Offer melee champions waveclear options/sustain options
 - Melee champions against ranged compositions just get too abused early on to the point of being bursted once they engage
- Configure the algorithm to always allow the enemy team to have an equal amount of ranged champions(mages/marksmen)
- Offer surrender at 10

replies.body: It should be random the only thing I agree with on your list is all accounts have access to entire champ pool.
To play something casual and mindless when you're burnt out from summoners rift.
